Newes out of Islington, or, A dialogue very merry and pleasant betwixt a knavish projector, and honest clod the plough-man with certaine songs of the late fall of the new beare-garden, and for the fall of projectors / by Tho. Herbert. Herbert, Thomas, 1597-1642?
14 p.
Printed for Thomas Lambert, London : 1641.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
